item.title: Mamie add a quote by Vince Lombardi
item.description: "It's not whether you got knocked down; it's whether you get back up." -- Vince Lombardi

item.title: Mamie add a quote by Flannery O'Connor
item.description: "Only if we are secure in our beliefs can we see the comical side of the universe." -- Flannery O'Connor

item.title: Mamie add a quote by Seneca
item.description: "Most powerful is he who has himself in his own power." -- Seneca

item.title: Mamie add a quote by Samuel Taylor Coleridge
item.description: "No mind is thoroughly well-organized that is deficient in a sense of humor." -- Samuel Taylor Coleridge

item.title: Mamie add a quote by Lorraine Hansberry
item.description: "Never be afraid to sit awhile and think." -- Lorraine Hansberry

item.title: Mamie add a quote by Edith Hamilton
item.description:
"It has always seemed strange to me that in our endless discussions about education so little stress is laid on the pleasure of becoming an educated person, the enormous interest it adds to life. To be able to be caught up into the world of thoughtâ€”that is to be educated."
[<i>Saturday Evening Post</i>, September 27, 1958]" -- Edith Hamilton

item.title: Mamie add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "You have attributed conditions to villainy that simply result from stupidity." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Mamie add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Mamie add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "There is no such thing as "Just a cat." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Mamie add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Once a month, some women act like men act all the time." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Mamie add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Mamie add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Mamie add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Mamie add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Mamie add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Mamie add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Mamie add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you can, with what you have, where you are." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Mamie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Mamie add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Mamie add a quote by Mary Edwards
item.description: "It's developmental" -- Mary Edwards
